body:
It may be desirable to have -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 for gcc5 system if TF was compiled as such, because system default is -D _GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=1.

So, -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 is not equivalent to not specifying this flag at all.
body_html:
It may be desirable to have -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 for gcc5 system if TF was compiled as such, because system default is -D _GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=1.

So, -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 is not equivalent to not specifying this flag at all.
body_text:
It may be desirable to have -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 for gcc5 system if TF was compiled as such, because system default is -D _GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=1.
So, -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 is not equivalent to not specifying this flag at all.
